Package etithespirit.orimod.common.tile

Interface IWorldUpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLightEnergyHub, AbstractLightEnergyLink, TileEntityLightCapacitor, TileEntityLightEnergyConduit
public interface IWorldUpdateListener
This interface mandates that the block entity implementing it receives notifications of the world changing.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changed(net.minecraft.world.level.LevelAccessor world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos at)
    Occurs when this block changes (as opposed to the typical setup where neighbors have changed).
    static IWorldUpdateListener
    from(net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity tile)
    If the given BlockEntity is an instance of IWorldUpdateListener, this will return it cast to an instance of this class.
    void
    neighborAddedOrRemoved(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos at, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos changedAt, net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity replacedTile, boolean isMoving)
    Occurs when a IWorldUpdateListener adjacent to this BlockEntity is added, replaced, or removed.
    default void

    Tells all neighbors of changedAt that this TE was added, replaced, or removed.

  • Method Details

    • from

      static IWorldUpdateListener from(net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity tile)
      If the given BlockEntity is an instance of IWorldUpdateListener, this will return it cast to an instance of this class. Otherwise, this will return null.
      Parameters:
      tile - The BlockEntity that might be (and ideally is) an IWorldUpdateListener
      Returns:
      An instance of IWorldUpdateListener, or null if tile could not be cast.

    • neighborAddedOrRemoved

      void neighborAddedOrRemoved(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos at, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos changedAt, net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity replacedTile, boolean isMoving)
      Occurs when a IWorldUpdateListener adjacent to this BlockEntity is added, replaced, or removed.
      Parameters:
      state - The state of this block.
      world - The world this change occurred in.
      at - Where in the world this change occurred.
      replacedTile - The previous TileEntity at the block. It will be missing core data, so reference the world and changedAt parameters to get the world and location.
      changedAt - Where the change occurred.
      isMoving - Whether or not this change occurred due to a piston push.

    • changed

      void changed(net.minecraft.world.level.LevelAccessor world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos at)
      Occurs when this block changes (as opposed to the typical setup where neighbors have changed).
      Parameters:
      world - The world the change occurred in.
      at - The location the change occurred in.

    • tellAllNeighborsAddedOrRemoved

      default void tellAllNeighborsAddedOrRemoved(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos changedAt, net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity replacedTile, boolean isMoving)
      Tells all neighbors of changedAt that this TE was added, replaced, or removed. Fires only for neighbors with TEs that are instances of IWorldUpdateListener.
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the block receiving the change signal.
      world - The world the signal occurred in.
      changedAt - The location of this block.
      replacedTile - The TileEntity that previously occupied the space. The new tile can be acquired via Level.getBlockEntity(BlockPos), and may not necessarily be an instance of IWorldUpdateListener.
      isMoving - Whether or not this was caused by a piston push.
